commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: I think we're really improving!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Yes, that seemed fairly balanced.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: I think for the second verse, instead of doing that leg move all together, we should try something a little more creative. What do you think?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Oh, I thought so, too. And the angles should match.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Okay, let me replay that part real quick.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Oh, I kind of ruin the balance.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Wow. Karin, you look so slender and stylish.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: We don't want me to be the only one standing out this time, though.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Hmm. Then let's tweak this part a little.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (Oh, what a waste. Karin looked so pretty.)

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: The singing needs to match up better, too. We should decide on everything now, like how many beats to hold the note at the end of the hook. Right?

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Yeah, I guess if we're going to do this, we need to be thorough.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Oh, sorry. That was me. I'll make sure to match the music better.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (But I really love how Emma's voice carries. This is a group performance though, so I guess we have to make the sacrifice.)

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Oops, I accidentally added an extra step again.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: You really hop around on stage like a little rabbit. A certain somebody was telling me how cute that is.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: What?! *Giggle* She tells you stuff like that? She should tell me, too!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: *Laugh* I'll let her know on the way home today.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Wh-When it's time to leave, I'll go with you! For now, I'll watch out for those extra steps.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Let's give it another shot! I'm gonna record it.

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Okay!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Whoa, that was great!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Yes, we were synchronized.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: What did you think?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: How can I put this feeling of uncertainty into words...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: The precision of the performance has improved each day. Their dancing is synchronized. Their voices sound lovely together. It's hard to believe it's their first time as a group.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: But something... I don't know. Something feels off.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: What's wrong?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Huh?! Oh, it's nothing!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Really? If you say so. So, what did you think of that performance?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You were completely in sync! It was perfect!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Really? Hearing you say that puts me in a great mood.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: We're getting closer to becoming your ideal group!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Y-Yeah.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: My ideal group?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Maybe...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Maybe this performance has become too much about what I want?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Maybe that's why I'm feeling uncomfortable.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Let's play it back again and review it!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Oops, my smile looks forced there.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: My smile is looking kind of stiff, too. How embarrassing!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Karin, you're amazing. Your expression never falters. I guess it's thanks to doing modeling.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I suppose I may be slightly better at controlling my facial expressions. Still, I really stand out too much during this part. Maybe I should move behind everyone?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Why didn't I realize this sooner? Even though it's a wonderful performance, and everyone's singing with a smile, it's all just a facade.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I've been trying to force them into performing like μ's and Aqours.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Even though I knew that what makes them really special is that they all have their own charms.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: But I made them suppress those, took away their freedom, and restrained them.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Maybe I'm moving too much? *Laugh* I always end up wanting to add extra steps there.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I know what you mean! I always want to pose during this part, right here.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: I love your poses, Kasumi.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: *Giggle* Thank you so much! I'm proud of my poses. I'm always practicing in front of the mirror.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I learned how to pose from Kasumi during the group practice. I used to find it embarrassing, but now it's really fun.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Karin taught me how to work my legs and make them look attractive. I feel a little more grown-up now, which makes me really happy.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Then it's time to teach you how to take your allure to the next level.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Huh?! W-Wait, I'm not emotionally prepared for that yet!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I was wrong.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Nijigasaki's idols each have their own distinct personalities.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: They have their own versions of what makes an ideal school idol, and they shine the most when they're aiming for that ideal.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Nijigasaki's members have their own charms that are different from those of μ's and Aqours.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: It's true that their group performances are overwhelmingly powerful, but that's because they're doing something that's a perfect fit for them.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: But the Nijigasaki that I love and support is different. If they're not having fun doing the things they want to do, their charms are cut in half.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: If everyone keeps working on what they truly enjoy doing, I think their charms could even surpass those of μ's and Aqours!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I think they have the potential to get there! I need to apologize and let them know I was wrong!
